tool.name: dialogue
tool.description: Call an AI provider with a prompt to have a dialogue. This tool sends the given prompt to the AI provider and returns the response.

parameters.parameter: The prompt message to send to the AI provider.

returns.field: Optional suggestions for troubleshooting if failed
Whether the response was from cache

Provider response details containing: - raw: Raw response from the provider - output: Extracted text output from the response - error: Error message if failed - session_id: Session/conversation ID for multi-turn dialogs - headers: Response headers - token_usage: Token usage statistics - cost: Estimated API cost - metadata: Additional metadata
